default_settings.name: Dock: Add folder (Torrents)
default_settings.description: Adds the torrents folder to the dock
default_settings.check_command: defaults read com.apple.Dock persistent-others | grep '"file-label" = torrents;'

default_settings.name: Dock: Add folder (Projects)
default_settings.description: Adds the projects folder to the dock
default_settings.check_command: defaults read com.apple.Dock persistent-others | grep '"file-label" = projects;'

default_settings.name: Spotlight: Disable external disk indexing
default_settings.description: Disables indexing external disks. To confirm the current status, run `mdutil -a -s`

default_settings.name: Spotlight: Disables indexing & searching of Bootcamp volume
default_settings.description: Disables generating a metadata index of the bootcamp volume for windows

default_settings.name: DNS: Sets up DNS to point to customer DNS resolver
default_settings.description: Utilizes Cloudflare's 1.1.1.1 DNS resolver by default. For more information, see https://1.1.1.1/

default_settings.name: Network Search: Disables ISP-level 'network search' hijacking
default_settings.description: ISPs like verizon have the ability to resolve to their own 'search page' if a domain is unable to be resolved. This disables 'network search' by pointing to a dummy local file instead

default_settings.name: Firewall: Blocks incoming traffic
default_settings.expected_check_state: Firewall is set to block all non-essential incoming connections

default_settings.name: Firewall: Enables stealthmode
default_settings.description: Disables automatically responding to anonymous ping requests

default_settings.name: Firewall: Enables the firewall
default_settings.description: Turns on the firewall as a middleware to incoming/exiting traffic

default_settings.name: Firewall: Enables signed binaries
default_settings.description: Enables execution of signed third-party binaries
default_settings.expected_check_state:
Automatically allow signed built-in software ENABLED 
Automatically allow downloaded signed software ENABLED

default_settings.name: Battery: Disables computer sleeping
default_settings.description: Sets the computer to never go to sleep unless explicitly told

default_settings.name: Battery: Disables display screen sleeping
default_settings.description: Sets the display screen to never go to sleep unless explicitly told

default_settings.name: Guest: Disables local guest account
default_settings.description: Disables the ability to login to the computer as a guest user
